explanation: [0-0] Three people are sitting at a green table on the street. The man on the left is wearing a yellow short-sleeved shirt and blue jeans. In the middle is a woman in black clothes, and the man on the right is wearing a blue and white striped short-sleeved shirt. Each of them is holding a glass of clear liquid and a green ball in the other hand. There is a red plate on the table, and a glass of green liquid at the right foot of the table. Behind them are colorful shops with brown-yellow buildings above and many people around.

[0-4] Then they put the green ball in their hands into the glass. The liquid in the glass turns green and bubbles appear. Immediately afterward, they pick up the glass and gulp down the green liquid. At the same time, the man in the yellow short-sleeved shirt slowly stands up while drinking, and some liquid drips from the side of the glass.

[4-8] Immediately afterward, the man in the yellow short-sleeved shirt finishes his drink first, puts the glass on the table, and sits down. Then the woman also puts down her glass, covering her mouth and laughing while placing the unfinished glass on the table. The man in the yellow short-sleeved shirt looks to the right with his hands clasped together. Then, the man in the blue and white striped short sleeves finishes drinking and puts the glass on the table.
